patthana16.45:4.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhattārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.45:4.3: Hetuyā cha … pe … purejāte āsevane dve … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.45:5.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabahiddhārammaṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
